title: why...?
review: Drinking paint (or literally anything else )would be a more productive way to spend your time then watching the Miranda Sings Netflix "comedy" special.

title: If you're a Miranda fan, you'll love it :) If not, watch the show then watch this.
review: Colleen Ballinger starts off the show, then transforms into Miranda. If you're a Miranda fan, you'll love it :) If not, watch the show, if you're still not, then at least you tried.

title: Amazing
review: You have to understand the character of Miranda almost to watch. As a long-time viewer who has not been able to go to shows, I loved this and found it enjoyable.
